issues.description: PDF is not tagged for accessibility - content structure is not defined

items.name: Document Identification
items.summary: Metadata, tagging, and document title requirements.

items.name: Forms & Alt Text
items.summary: Interactive elements need names and alternative text.

items.name: Annotations
items.summary: Annotations require Contents text for assistive tech.

items.name: Structure Tree
items.summary: Structure element semantics, RoleMap, and reading order.

items.name: Artifacts
items.summary: Artifacts must be separate from tagged content.

items.name: Tables
items.summary: Tables require header associations and structure.

items.name: Non-text Content
items.summary: Provide text alternatives for non-text content.

items.name: Info and Relationships
items.summary: Preserve semantics so assistive technology can convey relationships.

items.name: Meaningful Sequence
items.summary: Ensure reading order preserves intended meaning.

items.name: Contrast (Minimum)
items.summary: Text/background contrast must be at least 4.5:1 for body text.

items.name: Contrast (Enhanced)
items.summary: Enhanced 7:1 contrast aids users with low vision.

issues.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.

items.name: Bypass Blocks
items.summary: Provide the ability to skip repeated content via clear headings or bookmarks.

items.name: Page Titled
items.summary: Provide descriptive titles so users can identify content.

issues.description: Link annotation on page 1 lacks descriptive text or alternative text.
Link annotation on page 1 uses ambiguous text "click here".

items.name: Link Purpose (In Context)
items.summary: Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

issues.description: PDF does not specify document language
issues.recommendation: Note: this tool will set the document language to 'en-US' by default when fixing this issue.

items.name: Language of Page
items.summary: Declare the primary language for pronunciation support.

issues.description: Found 3 form annotation(s) that may lack proper labels

items.name: Labels or Instructions
items.summary: Provide instructions so users know required input.

automated.action: Add required PDF/UA metadata and structure
automated.title: Fix PDF/UA structure issue

automated.action: Apply document language 'en-US' to the PDF catalog
automated.description: Automatically sets the PDF document language to 'en-US' by default.
automated.title: Set document language

manual.description: PDF is not tagged for accessibility - content structure is not defined
manual.instructions: Use Adobe Acrobat or similar tool to add proper heading tags, paragraph tags, and list structures
manual.title: Tag content structure

semiAutomated.action: Add a clear first-page H1 heading, accessible bookmarks/outlines, or an internal TOC so users can bypass repeated content.
semiAutomated.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.
semiAutomated.title: Fix WCAG 2.4.1 issue

semiAutomated.action: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
semiAutomated.description: Link annotation on page 1 uses ambiguous text "click here".
semiAutomated.title: Fix WCAG 2.4.4 issue

semiAutomated.action: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
semiAutomated.description: Link annotation on page 1 lacks descriptive text or alternative text.
semiAutomated.title: Fix WCAG 2.4.4 issue

semiAutomated.description: Found 3 form annotation(s) that may lack proper labels
semiAutomated.title: Add form field labels

formIssues.description: Found 3 form annotation(s) that may lack proper labels
formIssues.recommendation: Ensure all form fields have associated labels and tooltips.
formIssues.wcagCriteria: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions (Level A) – Provide instructions so users know required input.; 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value (Level A) – Expose UI semantics programmatically.

issues.description: PDF is not tagged for accessibility - content structure is not defined
Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.
Link annotation on page 1 lacks descriptive text or alternative text.
Link annotation on page 1 uses ambiguous text "click here".
PDF does not specify document language
Found 3 form annotation(s) that may lack proper labels

linkIssues.description: Link annotation on page 1 lacks descriptive text or alternative text.
linkIssues.remediation: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
linkIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (Level AA) – Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

linkIssues.description: Link annotation on page 1 uses ambiguous text "click here".
linkIssues.remediation: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
linkIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (Level AA) – Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

missingLanguage.description: PDF does not specify document language
missingLanguage.recommendation: Set the document language in PDF properties (e.g., 'en-US' for English)
missingLanguage.wcagCriteria: 3.1.1 Language of Page (Level A) – Declare the primary language for pronunciation support.

pdfuaIssues.remediation: Add a metadata stream to the document catalog with PDF/UA Identification Schema
Add a structure tree root to the document catalog
Add dc:title entry to document metadata stream
Add MarkInfo dictionary to document catalog with Marked=true

untaggedContent.description: PDF is not tagged for accessibility - content structure is not defined
untaggedContent.recommendation: Use Adobe Acrobat Pro or similar tool to add tags and define document structure
untaggedContent.wcagCriteria: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (Level A) – Preserve semantics so assistive technology can convey relationships.; 1.3.2 Meaningful Sequence (Level A) – Ensure reading order preserves intended meaning.

wcagIssues.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.
wcagIssues.remediation: Add a clear first-page H1 heading, accessible bookmarks/outlines, or an internal TOC so users can bypass repeated content.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks (Level A) – Provide the ability to skip repeated content via clear headings or bookmarks.

wcagIssues.remediation: Add dc:title entry to document metadata stream
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.2 Page Titled (Level A) – Provide descriptive titles so users can identify content.

wcagIssues.description: Link annotation on page 1 lacks descriptive text or alternative text.
wcagIssues.remediation: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (Level AA) – Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

wcagIssues.description: Link annotation on page 1 uses ambiguous text "click here".
wcagIssues.remediation: Provide descriptive link text or Alt/Contents data so the link purpose is clear.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (Level AA) – Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

wcagIssues.recommendation: Note: this tool will set the document language to 'en-US' by default when fixing this issue.
wcagIssues.remediation: Set the Lang entry in the document catalog
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 3.1.1 Language of Page (Level A) – Declare the primary language for pronunciation support.
